trans-unit.source: Derivative of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidator"></xref> that is the base class for all composite activity validator components.
trans-unit.target: A származtatott <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidator"> </xref> , amely az összes összetett tevékenység érvényesítő összetevő alaposztálya.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The class provides validation logic for a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.CompositeActivityValidator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.CompositeActivityValidator"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: This method calls Validate on every child <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.EnabledActivities%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Ez a módszer minden gyermek meghívja a Validate <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>a a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.EnabledActivities%2A>gyűjtemény.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.EnabledActivities%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>

trans-unit.source: It also checks that no more than one <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CancellationHandlerActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlersActivity>, or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensationHandlerActivity> is attached to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Azt is ellenőrzi, hogy egynél több <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CancellationHandlerActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlersActivity>, vagy <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensationHandlerActivity>a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> csatolva</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensationHandlerActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlersActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CancellationHandlerActivity>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"></xref> of errors found during validation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"> </xref> az érvényesítés során hibák történtek.

trans-unit.source: obj is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: objnull hivatkozás ( a Visual Basic nyelvben).

trans-unit.source: Validates the change based on the affected <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> and provides the error.
trans-unit.target: A módosítás az érintett alapján ellenőrzi <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> és a hibaüzenet.

trans-unit.source: If validation occurs without error, a null reference (`Nothing`) is returned.
trans-unit.target: Érvényesítési hiba, egy null hivatkozás nélkül történik (`Nothing`) adja vissza.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction"> </xref> , amely meghatározza, hogy a módosítás.

trans-unit.source: action is a null reference ().
